title: Blood Moon thresh
body: Soo, how do i get this @#$% skin?

replies.body: id love riot to take my money but its like they dont want it yet
He'll be released later this patch. :D
Hahaha, I've been checking every day since SnowDown started, thinking Thresh would appear. :3 Still waiting and clutching my RP with white knuckles! No spending until Thresh gets a shiny new look! :D
i know you feeling men :/  (IM STILL WAITING FOR U {{champion:412}} )

I had thought they were going to release the Blood Moon skins before Snowdown since it wasn't mentioned in the Snowdown Summary post. I can't imagine them doing Snowdown and Blood Moon at the same time. I'm really bummed. They have had the splash arts showing for a week now and they haven't made them available.  I'd rather they just keep the  splash arts down until they physically release the skin/champ/ They've done the same thing with the last 3 Champion Releases
I would love to know too!! Patiently waiting.......
maybe this is a test to building anticipation. Personal ik that when you anticipate too long you start to lose interest.
No, its a plot for Riot to take your money.
Everyone disagreed with me when I've created a thread about this idea but I think the same thing.
When is it finaly gone come out D:
After we all die of impatience. I think I am going to seize up and have a stroke from that soon, so maybe when they get back from their holiday break or something?
No it doesn't. The 16th is the Winter Skins being Sejuani, Orianna and Malzahar. No where in that post did they mention the two Bloodmoon skins
i wish they kinda gave us something better than released later this patch
I wish they would too... cause I am STILL waiting for those two skins -_-

its all to make us want it more. they have teams of psychologists and guys studying our behaviors through our actions like how much and how fast do we purchase something  that we've been waiting for weeks and looking at the awesome splash art and they compare to things that we didn't had to wait for. that's just one example. this is a game but secretly is a HUGE business and business requires the study of costumer behavior. they're playing with our minds and wallets. and it's working i want to buy blood moon thresh despite his "hair" looking awful.

You wait. Wait till it's been released.

It will probably be released on Thursday, as that's when most of the skins are released (as Tuesday is the new Snowdown skins)
Just release it and take my freakin money!
